title: Animus
description: A shooting on the steps of cathedral in Palermo, on a day of celebration has left scars in the hearts and bodies of the Giacanti family. Alfonzo cannot forgive the cowards who struck at men when women and children were present. An enforcer goes hunting as the injured lay wounded in hospital beds. It is the vow of an aching heart, which one man recites in silence.'If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.'-Niccolo MachiavelliFollow the continuation of this ongoing action drama, filled with romance and suspense in this tenth installment of Alfonzo.
author: S.W. Frank
